dict.acceptation: 为…装上翼；使或使能飞行；飞过；

sent.orig: In Britain they call a fender a wing.
The damaged wings in broilers processing showed as wing broken, extravasated blood, wing worn, wing dislocated.
sent.trans: 肉鸡加工中残翅表现为断翅、淤血、磨烂、脱臼。

sent.orig: Their love is intense with longing, but they never can fly wing to wing.
sent.trans: 他们的爱情因渴望而更加热烈，但是他们永不能比翼双飞。

sent.orig: They can be classified as the right wing or the left wing, realistic and modernistic.
sent.trans: 这些作家中有左翼与右翼之分，现实主义与现代主义之别。

sent.orig: Flying wing to wing through the plebeian.
